name: Freeflight Aviation
about: Freeflight Aviation, located at the Flying W Airport in Medford, New Jersey, is a FAA-qualified flight school that has been serving the aviation community since 2003. We are renowned as Southern New Jerseyâ€™s friendliest and most value-added flight club, where students are treated as part of a family rather than just a Hobbs meter. Our mission is to make flying small airplanes fun and informative, offering a range of programs including Private Pilot Certificate, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot Certificate, and more. Our instructors are dedicated to providing a supportive and enjoyable learning environment. We also offer Discovery Flights, aircraft rentals, maintenance services, and a pilot supply shop. Freeflight Aviation is affiliated with prominent aviation associations such as AOPA and EAA, ensuring high standards in flight training. Join us to experience the joy of flying and personal growth that aviation provides.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
